description: A simple dashboard that can monitor libvirt KVM

panels.title: RX/TX Packets Per Sec on VMs

targets.expr:
(sum by (hostname) (label_replace(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle",instance=~".*nova.*|.*compute.*",os_region="$cluster"}[3m]), "hostname", "$1", "instance", "(.*)")))
 / on(hostname) group_left sum by (hostname)(((sum by (hostname) (label_replace(irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance=~".*nova.*|.*compute.*",os_region="$cluster"}[3m]), "hostname", "$1", "instance", "(.*)"))))) * 100 + on (hostname) group_left(availability_zone) 0 * (openstack_nova_running_vms{os_region="$cluster"} )

panels.description: Total time (ns) spent on reads on a block device, in ns, that is, 1/1,000,000,000 of a second, or 10−9 seconds.
panels.title: Top $TopItems Read time

panels.description: Total time (ns) spent on writes on a block device, in ns, that is, 1/1,000,000,000 of a second, or 10−9 seconds.
panels.title: Write time

panels.description: Resident Set Size of the process running the domain, in bytes.
panels.title: Top $TopItems Resident Set Size

panels.description: The total amount of data read from swap space
panels.title: Swap Read

panels.description: The total amount of memory written out to swap space
panels.title: Swap Written

panels.description: Number of packets received on a network interface.
panels.title: Top $TopItems RX Packets

panels.description: Number of packets transmitted on a network interface.
panels.title: TX Packets

panels.description: Number of packet receive/transmit drops on a network interface.
panels.title: Top $TopItems RX/TX Packets Drop

panels.description: Number of packet receive/trasmit errors on a network interface.
panels.title: RX/TX Packets Error

title: Openstack VMs Overview Admin
